Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class CLIDrawer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.CLIDrawer
public class CLIDrawer extends Object
This class is used to print the game objects on the CLI.

    • getGridAsString

      public String getGridAsString(ItemTileType[][] grid, String title, int position)
      This method converts a board grid into a string.
      Parameters:
      grid - is the grid to convert
      title - is the title of the grid
      position - is the position of the grid (not suer to keep it)
      Returns:
      the string representation of the grid
